title: GG EZ
body:
Can we all agree that this is toxic?
Maybe I'm just being an oversensitive baby, but it genuinely ruins a game when you have been having this fun competition against a group of rivals and this is the last thing said in chat.

If you lose, and somebody on the enemy team says this, it cheapens the entire game.
If you win, and somebody on your team types it, you feel terrible for having, against your will, just played with scum like this on your team.

Maybe it's just me. Maybe this isn't the biggest problem facing the player base.
All I know is that I'm reporting it from now on. I don't care that it's not a "Racial Slur", or straight up harassment, it harms my enjoyment of the game, and reporting is the only recourse available to me :(

replies.body: It's unsportsmanlike, and when that was a report option I would report it as such. I think calling it "toxic" is a bit of a stretch though.

I mean... it's _generally_ poor sportsmanship.

For example, when you stomp the enemy 28-5, and Yi says 'GG EZ'. Yeah, obviously, everyone knows it was stomp. Yi's just rubbing it in because he's inflating his ego.

On the other hand, when you have a 'Rift game go into the 55 minute mark (does that still happen?) with both teams pushing back and forth repeatedly, and the score and objectives are neck and neck, and one team FINALLY wins, and the enemy Taric types jokingly  '**GG EZ ~wipes brow~'** (because it obviously WASN'T easy) and everyone cracks up laughing... that's just damn funny!

It's not so that's it's said, it's HOW and WHEN it's said.
I only say it when the other team remakes lul
I only say it after my team gets absolutely stomped as a joke

Now if it was one time i would had let it go but this person said it 5 min min befor the game even ended and more than 1 time to. And when the game ended she spam it  more. Okay the game was indeed ez for them cause it was  a aram game and the enemy poked us out not mutch we could do that game. like you said if you lost in  a short amount of time its fine ofc they call it ez. But if you spam it its becomes more than just saying ez game. If you keep saying it over and over again it starts to sound more like haha you lost.

its like extremely mildly unsportsmanlike.

the people who are upset by it are the people who need to have it said to them.  toughen up and learn to be a man
In my opinion its friendly banter, and its been part of me all of my video game life, it would make me sad to see it go away, but thats just me
